title: Magnesium fluoride-engineered UiO-66 artificial protection layers for dendrite-free lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01428F, Paper
Kunik Jang, Hee Jo Song, Jung Been Park, Sang Won Jung, Dong-Wan Kim
The MgF2 and F-terminated groups effectively infiltrated the ion transport channels within UiO-66, thereby regulating the desolvation process and facilitating rapid Li+ transport kinetics.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
